text: Last update just ruined it. make it look like the average common chat app. You CAN'T edit your texts now, wich was very useful for some typos, you CAN'T change your prof name, which was a current joke onnthe group, you CAN'T find any files now, chat has serious lag/bugs. I hope there ws a way to return to the old version until this failed update has been fixed. I can understand new versions have some bugs. Will give it a chance to see if is for better or worse.

EDIT: no way to delete a contact only block it! Who made this a logical choice? No support if there's a bug unless you are a paid user. Wire gets slow as you use it more and more(removing it and cleaning all history makes it fast again). In the past they did help with bugs nowadays if you are a free user ..either live with the bugs or ditch it and get a different app EDIT2: Lately the app has become very heavy and sluggish, deleting cache doesn't seem to help
Love it
Does not support SMS or MMS which is what I was trying to use it for. Not a replacement for Signal now that it stopped supporting those messages types
Last update of this app is waste. Full of bugs!! Even I can't see the photo I received
Nice
Great job!
Cannot share images from stock google photo app to wire group... Feature gone again ..

The latest update causes entire conversations to be lost, forces you to use a split screen with no option to change it (which makes the remote video tiny), no video options, and if you try to change the camera it just says "not yet implemented". The latest version was clearly not properly tested before being pushed out. If you use this app I would recommend disabling automatic updates so this does not happen to you too.

Thanks,

text: I am very disapointed by the last update. At first I thought that some intern accidentally pushed an old version on production, but oh god it seems intentional. It reminds me of how Microsoft ruined Skype, but even worse. Devs, did you do any user testing at all? Because I do not understand the reasoning of releasing a new version with so many features REMOVED or made worse. Please, rollback this version and do not release it until you develop all the features your users are used to.
Love it

It's a total CRASHING dud. I got rid of it before as it crashed constantly. Ok for text and phone calls. But audio files over a minute crash. Locks up. On call it glitches the screen. Flicks between apps. I want to like it. But it is an absolute dog of a thing. Keep for texts and calls if you're desperate to keep in touch with a computer illiterate fugative who can't give his number out.

Msgs don't come through in time.. (not a network problem).. no sound for calls.. and worst of all, lost all conversations in the newest update and the backup file is now incompatible with the new updated version so conversations cannot be restored. I'm deleting this and using signal.

replyText:
Hello,

to solve this quickly for you, can you try:

1) Going to Settings > Debug Settings > Enable logging
2) Press the Start migration button
3) Send us those logs via the report bug button, the logs will be attached automatically

For more information please contact us at https://support.wire.com/hc/en-us/requests/new

Best,
Wire Support Team

I don't know why this app doesn't get a better rating, because it's fantastic. I love how you can use it without adding a phone number, because I tried that Signal app and it kept logging me out on all my devices and asking me to verify them by a text message code. This is far superior! 😎

Downloaded this app for personal use, and I absolutely love it so far (got it today). The UI is clean and intuitive. The features are rich and way beyond what I've seen in other messaging apps (not gimmicky yet robust). My notifications work well, and no messages are disappearing (note though that such is a feature if a user wants to set a timer for a message to delete!). Feature request: notifications on only PC or phone, one or the other depending which you are actively using.
So far so good. Easy to install, just be careful with the auto msg deletion feature .
